General.Name: Carrols Restaurant Group Inc
General.Description: Carrols Restaurant Group, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as a restaurant company in the United States. The company operates as a Burger King and Popeyes franchisee. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Syracuse, New York.
General.Address: 968 James Street, Syracuse, NY, United States, 13203
